data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'KDV1 - Düğüm'
//@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define view entity ZTAX_DDL_I_VAT1_NODE
  as select from ztax_t_kdv1g
  association to parent ZTAX_DDL_I_VAT1_SUBHEAD as _SubHead on  $projection.CompanyCode = _SubHead.CompanyCode
                                                            and $projection.Refrection1 = _SubHead.Refrection1
                                                            and $projection.Refrection2 = _SubHead.Refrection2

association [1..1] to ZTAX_DDL_I_VAT1_COMPANY_CODE as _CompanyCodes on $projection.CompanyCode = _CompanyCodes.CompanyCode

{
  key bukrs  as CompanyCode,
  key kiril1 as Refrection1,
  key kiril2 as Refrection2,
  key mwskz  as TaxCode,
  key saknr  as GLAccountNumber,
      topal  as TotalArea,
      topalk as TotalAreaRules,
      shkzg  as DCIndicator,
      _SubHead,
      _CompanyCodes
}
